about_the_game:
Updates and Community

Evil Art Bunny Studios Discord:

Alchemist's Mountain is a classic platforming puzzle dungeon adventure with a literal twist! Rotate the entire dungeon to manipulate blocks, water, gravitational beams, and many other elements, to reach each dungeon's menacing Boss. Chart your path through an undead army and mechanical guardians, to the pinnacle of the Starfall Spire where legends rumor lie the secret to immortality and everlasting wealth.

Story



When she was 10 years old, Sophia's father stopped talking to her. After his death six years later, Sophia gathered all his research on the fabled Alchemist's Mountain. Legends tell that the Alchemist's died long ago in a terrible war, but that he left upon the peak of the mountain, the secret to eternal youth and infinite riches. But no one has made their way through the strange and twisting ruins of the Mountain to reach its peak for more than a century. Yet, armed with little more than her trusty backpack and a journal full of her father's notes, Sophia makes her way towards the mountain, determined to make sense of her life and her father's...

Development

Alchemist's Mountain was born in Metroidvania Jam 2, where it won first place! And since then its concept has been developed and refined by a solo indie dev (while changing nappies and extracting teeth).
